response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. Given its significance, I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $1,300,000. This offer reflects my desire to find the right person who appreciates the true worth of this product and will cherish it as much as I have. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1300000}
